title: Movie poster - Sleepy Hollow
content:
Hi everybody,

Does anyone know the name of the different typefaces used on this "Sleepy Hollow" movie poster ?

Thank you for all the help you can provide !

Tristan

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114227im_/http:/typophile.com/files/600full-sleepy-hollow-poster_5253.jpg)

Font: 

 Caslon Antique 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114227/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: Tristan Isaac

comments.content:
"HEADS WILL ROLL" & "THANKS GIVING" look like **[Caslon Antique](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114227/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=URW%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Caslon%20Antique%20T%20-%20Regular&fid=3a08652b30423a3d12fa33d46dcb87bf&fsize=60&text=HEADS%20WILL%20ROLL%20THANKS%20GIVING&wrap=2)**  
and there is also a font called **[Sleepy Hollow](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114227/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-7%20%2F%20%28Freemium%29&ffam=Sleepy%20Hollow%203.0%20-%20Regular&fid=411f99739dacdb5f0baf48f909696956&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=Sleepy%20Hollow&fit=1)** by Jens R. Ziehn [Free for personal use] obviously inspired by the movie title
Thank you very much. Does someone know the name of this others ?

It think it's all Caslon Antique, just squooshed.

- Lex
